metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2509 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability found in gnutls. This security flaw happens because of adouble free error occurs during verification of pkcs7 signatures ingnutls_pkcs7_verify function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
guile-gnutls - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
libgnutls30 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.13-2ubuntu1.7').
